articles.description:
Image: Jankenteam/Merge Games/Sega
    


  
Sega‚Äôs Master System mascot gets a makeover, but not much else
 The latest revival of a vintage Sega game that‚Äôs not made by Sega itself is Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX, a remaster of the 8-bit platformer that launched on the Sega Master System. Developed by Jankenteam and originally created as a fan project, the officially sanctioned remaster is a handsome visual update that does little else to modernize Alex Kidd‚Äôs 35-year-old adventure.
Alex Kidd in Miracle World DX plays nearly identically to its 1986 counterpart, largely for the worse. The developers, who clearly love Alex Kidd, have only slightly modified how Sega‚Äôs former mascot controls. Many of the changes are superficial or minor interface changes; it‚Äôs easier to use Alex‚Äôs power ups,‚Ä¶
articles.title: Alex Kidd in Miracle World‚Äôs remaster doesn‚Äôt do enough to redeem Sega‚Äôs old mascot

articles.description:
Shuck on that, Call of Duty
 With big-budget, pre-rendered cinematics and a narrator after Sam Elliott‚Äôs own heart, Focus Home Interactive wants you to know that Farming Simulator 22 is officially not, uh, farmin‚Äô around when it lands on your harvest table this Thanksgiving.
We‚Äôve gotta hand it to them, and developers Giants Software, and whoever directed this. If the match cut of a truck bedliner‚Äôs grooves to the 24 earthen lines carved by a New Holland disc harrow doesn‚Äôt get you fired up to put some wheat in the ground, then perhaps nothing will.
And perhaps nothing will, if you‚Äôre the soft-hands type whose Novembers are spent on Call of Duty instead of doing real virtual work. Or virtual real work. Whatever, snowflake, Farming Simulator 22 dispenses wisdom, not Pez.
Speaking of wisdom, the man quoted in the opening of the trailer was Mohandas K. Gandhi. And Farming Simulator 22 will find the divinity within you on Nov. 22, 2021 on PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X.
articles.title: Farming Simulator gives us holiday 2021‚Äôs first big-budget CGI hype trailer

articles.description:
A scene from Godfall, one of the first seven games to support AMD FidelityFX Super Resolution. | Image: Counterplay Games/Gearbox Publishing
    

  
FidelityFX Super Resolution promises massive performance gains
 AMD‚Äôs new foray into the field of image enhancement technologies is now available, providing PC gamers with an open-source alternative to options like Nvidia‚Äôs well-regarded Deep Learning Super Sampling.
First teased last fall during the announcement of the Radeon RX 6000 series graphics cards, AMD‚Äôs technology is called FidelityFX Super Resolution. The goal of these kinds of techniques is to improve performance (i.e., frame rate) by rendering a game at a lower internal resolution and then upscaling that original image to a higher output resolution ‚Äî without sacrificing image qua‚Ä¶
articles.title: AMD‚Äôs answer to Nvidia‚Äôs image-upscaling DLSS tech is here

articles.description:
Image: Mojang/Sega
    

  
30th anniversary Sonic DLC available in Minecraft‚Äôs marketplace
 Sonic the Hedgehog and friends are now playable in Minecraft, making good on a tease from Sega earlier this year. Sega and Minecraft developer Mojang promise ‚Äúepic levels,‚Äù races against friends, and hidden secrets in the first trailer for Sonic the Hedgehog‚Äôs blockiest adventure yet.
The whole gang‚Äôs here: Knuckles the Echidna, Amy Rose, Miles ‚ÄúTails‚Äù Prower, Shadow the Hedgehog, Super Sonic, Dr. Robotnik, and, well, some Chaos. Big the Cat does not appear to be confirmed ... yet.
Minecraft players will be able to visit Sonic‚Äôs popular haunts, like the Green Hills Zone and Chemical Plant Zone, and battle bosses (Robotnik, naturally) in the new Minecraft Marketplace content. Players can also nab a free Sonic the Hedgehog character creator item. An upcoming two-week special event will feature Sonic the Hedgehog-themed minigames and ‚Äúadditional surprises.‚Äù
Sonic the Hedgehog turns 30 years old this week, and Sega is marking the anniversary with a variety of new game projects, including a Sonic Colors remaster, a retro collection that includes Sonic 3 and Knuckles, and a new 3D Sonic game coming sometime next year.
articles.title: Sonic the Hedgehog is in Minecraft now

articles.description:
Image: Blizzard Entertainment
    

  
Competitive mode separates PC and console; players may opt-out
 Overwatch‚Äôs long-requested cross-platform play launched on Tuesday, Blizzard has announced. The feature connects players on all platforms: Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Windows PC, and Xbox One.
The update means that all Overwatch players must set up a free Battle.net account (or connect to an existing one) and link it to their console accounts, regardless of whether they want to participate in cross-platform multiplayer.
Going forward, cross-play will be available to all Overwatch playlists, with limitations on the game‚Äôs Competitive mode. In Competitive, console players will be matched with one another, and PC players will only be matched with other PC players. Overwatch players can toggle an opt-out for cross-play, but that means they will only be matched with other players on their platform who have also opted out, which shrinks their pool of available matches.
In addition to cross-play support, Overwatch‚Äôs June 22 update introduces a new challenge ‚Äî Ashe‚Äôs Deadlock Challenge ‚Äî offering four new cosmetics, including a Legendary Ashe and B.O.B. Skin, for playing up to 27 games. Players may also watch up to six hours of Overwatch matches on Twitch to earn up to three more sprays.
The challenge ties into ‚ÄúDeadlock Rebels,‚Äù a new novel by Lyndsay Ely, which goes deep into the history between Ashe and another fan-favorite hero, McCree, and how they founded the Deadlock gang. A preview of its first chapter, localized in 14 languages, is also available for free beginning June 22.
articles.title: Overwatch cross-play is available now

articles.description:
Image: Crystal Dynamics/Square Enix
    

  
Players‚Äô IP addresses are showing on-screen
 Marvel‚Äôs Avengers was updated on Tuesday, with new content added to Crystal Dynamics‚Äô ensemble beat-‚Äôem-up. The patch also has one serious and potentially dangerous issue: Some players‚Äô IP addresses are being shown on the screen.
The update went live Tuesday morning, and players have reported this problem to the studio since then. Forbes reporter Paul Tassi confirmed that bug revealed his information in white text at the bottom of a screenshot he posted to Twitter. 
this is legitimately "shut the game off" bad pic.twitter.com/o22YOeLwuL
‚Äî Paul Tassi (@PaulTassi) June 22, 2021



The game‚Äôs official social media account coyly confirmed there was a problem in the game with ‚Äúa floating string of text.‚Äù D‚Ä¶
articles.title: Marvel‚Äôs Avengers bug reveals players‚Äô personal information

articles.description:
Image: Tuque Games
    


  
If you grew up reading The Crystal Shard, this one‚Äôs for you
 The first trailer for Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance is dark and haphazard, ridden with nauseating visuals set to post-hardcore metal that tries to sell a perceived coolness to a franchise associated with a tabletop scenario. It felt like a show of desperation, an attempt to prove something to an untapped player base. But that trailer couldn‚Äôt be any more misleading. Instead, Dark Alliance tapped directly into the comforting nostalgia of sitting on the floor of my bedroom as a child, bending the spine of the novel that would be one of my first exposures to Western fantasy and everything the genre would behold.
Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance attempts to adapt one of the most seminal novels in Th‚Ä¶
articles.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance has rough edges, but the deep comfort of nostalgia

articles.description:
Image: James Bareham/Polygon
    

  
Amazon Prime Day 2021 is here, and we‚Äôve scoured the retailer to find the event‚Äôs best sales.
As usual, Amazon is discounting thousands of products this Prime Day. Some of of those products aren‚Äôt worth your time, but we‚Äôve spent a lot of time combing through the deals  so that you don‚Äôt have to. Check out our Prime Day 2021 coverage for deals on 4K TVs, gaming accessories and more. There aren‚Äôt a ton of deals on video games, but we found  bunch of discounts on add-ons like controllers, headsets, keyboards, and more. 
If you‚Äôve shopped during Amazon Prime Day before, you know the deal: Some of the stuff is solid. Other stuff is ‚Ä¶ well, let‚Äôs say less than great. That‚Äôs sales for you! Our goal while pouring over the deals was to find whatever we thought you‚Äôd like. 
We‚Äôll be updating posts regularly throughout the event. Keep this page bookmarked to stay updated on the best deals of Amazon Prime Day 2021 in gaming and entertainment.
articles.title: The best Amazon Prime Day 2021 gaming and entertainment deals

articles.description:
Image: Riot Games
    

  
Yes, even Valorant
 Riot Games is unrolling a major lore event across all of their games, and it all comes from the Ruined King. Viego, the ultimate wife guy and undead wraith, is going on the offensive in an event called Sentinels of Light Starting on July 8, Sentinels of Light will play out in League of Legends, Legends of Runeterra, Wild Rift, Teamfight Tactics, and even the completely unrelated shooter Valorant.
The event‚Äôs key art, which was revealed by fans through a puzzle on the official Riot site, shows off a few things we can expect from the event. Viego and Thresh, the bad guys from the in-game setting of the Shadow Isles, seem to serve a central role as the antagonists. The Sentinels of Light, a faction dedicated to battling back the Black Mist of the‚Ä¶
articles.title: League of Legends‚Äô Ruined King will plague all of Riot‚Äôs games in new event

articles.description:
Image: Rebellion Developments
    

  
Bill, Francis, Louis, and Zoey show up in Zombie Army 4: Dead War
 Zombie Army 4: Dead War is a game where players battle the zombie armies of Hitler as they pour forth from a Hellmouth. It‚Äôs a terrible world where Europe is overrun by the walking dead, and it takes a lot of firepower to clean it up. Well, reinforcements have arrived.
The original cast of Left 4 Dead: Zoey, Francis, Louis, and Bill, are all playable characters in the game‚Äôs latest season, Rebellion Entertainment announced on Tuesday. Zombie Army 4‚Äôs latest update also adds a new map and mission. Players can delve into the Abaddon Asylum in the second mission of the ‚ÄúReturn to Hell‚Äù campaign, where players must hunt down the deadly Baron Umbra. 
The map is available for $6.99, but the Left 4 Dead Character Pack is free on all platforms.
This isn‚Äôt the first time the Left 4 Dead cast have wandered out of their original game. All eight characters from both Left 4 Dead titles were playable in the original Zombie War trilogy. Bill has even shown up in Dead by Daylight, where players can uncover some scary lore about his past in Vietnam.
Zombie Army 4: Dead War launched in February 2020 on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.
articles.title: Left 4 Dead‚Äôs original crew is back (in a different zombie game)

articles.description:
Image: Riot Games
    

  
A revenant, a time traveler, and a chonky sand monster walk into a bar...
 Legends of Runeterra, the card game set in the greater League of Legends universe, will feel quite different soon. On June 30, Riot will release Rise of the Underworlds, a new expansion with 40 cards. The patch also aims to make tons of balance changes to shake up the meta-game.
Rise of the Underworlds come with three new champions: the undead pirate Pyke, time-traveler punk Ekko, and monster queen Rek‚Äôsai. These playable characters in League of Legends make for powerful cards in Legends of Runeterra, and they are often the central point of several possible deck combinations.
The set also comes with a new keyword: Lurk, which powers up lurker enemies. Lurker enemies thrive when they‚Äôre at the top of your deck. When they‚Äôre in that position, and you attack your enemy, every Lurker ally in your deck gets +1 damage. 
Image: Riot Games
  
In terms of lore, the new cards will help round out the settings of Zaun, Shurima, and Bilgewater. Supporting cards from Legends of Runeterra can end up playing important roles in the longterm story of the setting.
Legends of Runeterra is a free-to-play game available on iOS, Android, and Windows PC. Riot will be revealing one new card from the set every day on strategy site Mobalytics.
articles.title: Legends of Runeterra‚Äôs next expansion adds Ekko, Pyke, and Rek‚Äôsai

articles.description:
Image: Jump Over the Age
    

  
A slice-of-life RPG set in the ruins of interplanetary capitalism
 A lot of flashy and exciting games got announced during E3 earlier this month. A second trailer (and release date) for Elden Ring! Bethesda‚Äôs Starfield! Arkane‚Äôs Redfall! But of all the games shown during this year‚Äôs biggest gaming news event, the game that‚Äôs stuck in my mind the most is a little indie title whose trailer was tucked into the back half of the PC Gaming Show: Citizen Sleeper.
Developed by Gareth Damian Martin, aka Jump Over The Age, Citizen Sleeper is a slice-of-life narrative RPG inspired by tabletop roleplaying games. Set on a derelict space station named Erlin‚Äôs Eye, Citizen Sleeper‚Äôs cast consists of a ragtag group of outcasts, hackers, mercenaries, and everyday folks try‚Ä¶

articles.description:
Image: Tuque Games/Wizards of the Coast
    

  
Battle your way through Icewind Dale
 Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance lets up to four players take on classic roles to battle through enemy armies. It‚Äôs a pretty straightforward hack-and-slash adventure, but there‚Äôs still advice we wish we had starting out.
In this Dark Alliance beginner‚Äôs guide, we‚Äôll give you our seven best tips for your adventure through Icewind Dale.
Playing with friends unlocks new moves
Playing D&D: Dark Alliance solo is a hack-and-slash adventure without a lot of subtlety. Playing with friends is a little different. Pulling off certain moves like parrying or backstabs will trigger Team Attacks. These attacks make managing your enemies much easier and make those moves a lot more meaningful.
Characters are classes
You‚Ä¶
articles.title: Dungeons & Dragons: Dark Alliance beginner‚Äôs guide, tips, and tricks

articles.description:
Image: Asobo Studio/Xbox Game Studios
    

  
The Xbox creator has built up a diverse gaming lineup
 In Microsoft‚Äôs E3 2021 presentation last week, the Xbox maker finally revealed the fruits of its five-year plan to forge an empire. The company‚Äôs higher-ups have spent years building to this future, quietly toiling away at acquisitions and refining the Xbox platform while competitor Sony flashed its major cinematic games, like God of War and Spider-Man. Now, Microsoft has something to show for those seemingly slow years. 
Based on the Xbox and Bethesda E3 showcase, there appears to be no one ‚Äútype‚Äù of gamer that the company is targeting, with games both big and small in the mix. Then there‚Äôs the temptation of a good deal with Xbox Game Pass, and ease of access via Xbox Cloud Gaming. But th‚Ä¶
articles.title: Xbox Game Studios exec says the focus is diversity ‚Äî in games, studios, and players

articles.description:
Previewing a pack still takes players through the animation where highly rated players, in this case, Liverpool center back Joe Gomez, are revealed. | Image: EA Vancouver/Electronic Arts via Polygon
    

  
The catch: If you don‚Äôt like the contents, you wait 24 hours to see a new pack
 FIFA 21 Ultimate Team players may now preview the specific contents of every pack of cards sold in EA Sports‚Äô extremely lucrative but heavily criticized mode. The change comes with certain catches, but it seems to carefully respond to long-running complaints and discomforts, ranging from government regulators in Europe to rank-and-file fans playing a microtransaction-filled game.
‚ÄúPreview Packs‚Äù were introduced on Friday and are the only kind of packs sold in the FUT Shop through this year‚Äôs ‚ÄúFestival of FU‚Ä¶
articles.title: FIFA Ultimate Team now shows pack contents before you buy

articles.description:
Image: Nintendo
    

  
Even platforming masters aren‚Äôt immune 
 Trolls are the most recognizable element of ultra-hard Mario hacks and levels, known as kaizo. A simple, unexpected obstacle is not only funny but also creates that special sauce that makes kaizo so fun to watch. But not all trolls are created equally, and many creators use different interpretations of the concept to subvert players‚Äô expectations.
A subgenre under the broader umbrella of ROM hacking, kaizo hacks emphasize precision and mastery in a way that‚Äôs much more difficult than normal Mario platformers. These user-created games are also are known for containing an abundance of trolls. Some particularly devilish or clever levels are even designed to exploit the player‚Äôs knowledge of the genre and its conventions. Here a‚Ä¶
articles.title: Six Super Mario kaizo trolls that surprise and delight

articles.description:
Image: Funselektor
    

  
Players have until Saturday afternoon to claim it
 GOG.com has a free game available for the next two days, and it‚Äôs a pretty good one: Absolute Drift: Zen Edition, by Funselektor, whose follow-up Art of Rally launched in September.
Absolute Drift, for Windows PC is a series of drifting/gymkhana challenges raced from a stylized, top-down perspective, somewhat resembling a Micro Machines racing game. Absolute Drift launched on Windows in 2015, and then on Xbox One and PlayStation 4 in August of 2017. It launched at the beginning of 2021 for Nintendo Switch, too. Absolute Drift is ordinarily $11.99; it has a ‚ÄúVery Positive‚Äù user rating on Steam.
We were enamored of Funselektor‚Äôs Art of Rally, which is a different type of racing but has similar stylish visuals. This video gives a better idea of what Absolute Drift entails.


Players have until Saturday afternoon to claim Absolute Drift. All they need is a free GOG.com account and to opt-in to CD Projekt‚Äôs marketing notices.
articles.title: Stylish racer Absolute Drift is free on GOG.com

articles.description:
Image: Rare/Xbox Game Studios
    

  
Rare reveals new gameplay of Pirates of the Caribbean expansion
 Sea of Thieves developer Rare dropped a big surprise on Sunday during E3 2021‚Äôs Xbox and Bethesda Games Showcase: Captain Jack Sparrow and Davy Jones are coming to the silly seafaring game in a new, Pirates of the Caribbean-themed adventure called Sea of Thieves: A Pirate‚Äôs Life. On Thursday, Rare gave fans another look at that forthcoming content with a new gameplay trailer.
The new trailer shows off more of the new story, spooky new areas, new enemies, and new cosmetics ‚Äî yes, you and your crew will be able to dress up like Jack Sparrow ‚Äî coming in Sea of Thieves: A Pirate‚Äôs Life when it launches June 22 as a free update. The gameplay trailer also apparently reveals that players will come face to face, literally, with the game‚Äôs Kraken.
Sea of Thieves is available on Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X, and is included as part of a Xbox Game Pass subscription.
articles.title: Everyone can dress like Jack Sparrow in Sea of Thieves soon

articles.description:
Image: Ninja Theory/Xbox Game Studios
    

  
Senua‚Äôs Saga sounds still very early in development
 Ninja Theory‚Äôs sequel to Hellblade: Senua‚Äôs Sacrifice didn‚Äôt make an appearance at Microsoft‚Äôs Xbox and Bethesda Games Showcase at E3 2021 for what sounds like a very good reason: The game, Senua‚Äôs Saga: Hellblade 2, appears to still be quite early in development, based on a new update from the developer.
Tameem Antoniades, ‚Äúchief creative ninja‚Äù at Ninja Theory, said in a development update Thursday that the Senua‚Äôs Saga: Hellblade 2 team is currently ‚Äúbuilding a good chunky slice of the game before we then move into full production to build out the rest.‚Äù
Antoniades said that Ninja Theory ‚Äúdidn‚Äôt want to do a straight sequel ‚Äî we wanted to do something extra special, and so we‚Äôre making our lives as difficult as possible in that pursuit.‚Äù
Senua‚Äôs Saga: Hellblade 2 will be set in ninth-century Iceland, Antoniades said, and to properly capture that setting, Ninja Theory has sent its ‚Äúart and audio teams out there doing photography, photogrammetry, and combining it with satellite data to recreate large swathes of the landscape.‚Äù
‚ÄúOn the character front, we‚Äôre building real costumes [and] scanning them in,‚Äù Antoniades said. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre collaborating with Epic Games to bring you next-generation digital characters, [and] on the combat front, we want it to be extra real and brutal, so Melina [Juergens], our main actress, has been training for two years, and all of our animators have undergone combat training.‚Äù
Antoniades‚Äô update concluded with ‚Äúnot a trailer, not a gameplay reveal, but montage of the kind of work we‚Äôve been up to.‚Äù
Senua‚Äôs Saga: Hellblade 2 was first announced in December 2019, at The Game Awards, as one of the first Xbox Series X games. The original Hellblade was released in 2017, and was praised for its narrative structure as well as the performance of Melina Juergens. That game told the story of Senua, a Pict warrior who travels to the Norse plane of Helheim.
articles.title: Ninja Theory gives an update on Hellblade 2, which seems far away

articles.description:
Bungie/Activision
    

  
Destiny‚Äôs story is about to get (more) complicated
 A new update in Destiny 2 suggests that Savathun, the titular Witch Queen in the game‚Äôs upcoming expansion and sister to Oryx, has taken human form in the Last City. And fans are freaking out.
As Destiny 2‚Äôs story has improved, players have gotten even more ravenous for details on upcoming story beats and expansions. So far, Season of the Splicer has told a mostly contained story about prejudice and refugees. But players discovered a new lore page on Tuesday that really escalated the threat in this Destiny 2 season, potentially setting up story beats for the upcoming expansion.
Savathun is a well-known trickster, working primarily in lies and deception ‚Äî think Loki, but much more gross and possessed by a giant w‚Ä¶
articles.title: Destiny 2‚Äôs weekly update suggests the Witch Queen walks among us

articles.description:
Joey Slye making the most recent attempt at a fair catch kick in an NFL game ‚Äî appropriately enough, this was in London, Oct. 13, 2019. | Photo: John Walton/PA Images via Getty Images
    

  
C‚Äômon, EA! It was a favorite play for Madden himself!
 Madden NFL 22 is launching with a lot of new features, including new layers to the Franchise mode that should deepen an experience hardcore fans have felt was neglected. But it will not, for the 30th consecutive year, include the fair catch kick. Curses! Drat!
‚ÄúI was hoping for that question,‚Äù said gameplay producer Clint Oldenburg, who has come to expect it from me every year. ‚ÄúNo, it‚Äôs not going to be in [Madden NFL] 22, but I do ask [at developers‚Äô meetings] every year, and I say this: ‚ÄòThe fair catch kick is worth at least one Metacritic poin‚Ä¶
articles.title: The NFL‚Äôs bizarre fair catch kick still isn‚Äôt in Madden, but one can still hope!

articles.description:
Image: Asobo Studio/Xbox Game Studios
    

  
Norway you should miss out on this Swede new update
 Microsoft Flight Simulator‚Äôs virtual world is getting a gorgeous new update, making the game‚Äôs Nordic region more beautiful than ever. World Update 5: Nordics for Asobo Studio‚Äôs flight sim gives some love and attention to landmarks and airports across Denmark, Finland, Iceland, Norway, and Sweden. The update is free and available now.
Microsoft says that World Update 5 includes improvements in detail to ‚Äúbroad swaths of landscapes, enhancements to regional architecture, improved data for 100 airports and 78 carefully selected points of interest.‚Äù As seen in the gameplay trailer above, those points of interest include Lego House, Frederiksborg Castle, and the city of Copenhagen in Denmark; Uddevalla Bridge, Avicii Arena, and Sarek National Park in Sweden; Olavinlinna and the city of Helsinki in Finland; Flakstad, the Arctic Cathedral, and Holmenkollbakken in Norway; and Hallgr√≠mskirkja, J√∂kuls√°rl√≥n, and Hv√≠tserkur in Iceland. Not shown: how much I‚Äôd really like to visit any of those places in real life right now.


Local airports ‚Äî Denmark‚Äôs Bornholm, Iceland‚Äôs √çsafj√∂r√∞ur, Sweden‚Äôs Stockholm Arlanda, Norway‚Äôs Svalbard, and Finland‚Äôs Vaasa ‚Äî have all been ‚Äúcarefully replicated by hand for maximum realism,‚Äù Asobo Studio said in a post on the Microsoft Flight Simulator website, which names every new point of interest. The update also includes localization in Swedish, Norwegian, and Finnish.
Microsoft Flight Simulator is available now on Windows PC and is coming to Xbox Series X on July 27. A Top Gun-themed expansion for the game is planned for later this year.
articles.title: Microsoft Flight Simulator‚Äôs new update looks Nordic-ulous

articles.description:
Burst into its colorful, lively world 
 In the first level of OlliOlli World, I fly down a boardwalk on my skateboard. Riding by, I see people dining outside under large umbrellas along the shore. I land a backside grind while riding a rail over swimmers. Confetti flies on the screen because I just nailed a sick trick. The world is dripping in warm pink hues and turquoise accents. It‚Äôs a beautiful day, and everything feels good. 
The summertime vibes are part of OlliOlli World, a cartoony 2.5D skateboarding action-platformer coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X this winter. It‚Äôs being made by Roll7, the studio behind Laser League and Not a Hero (not to mention OlliOlli and OlliOlli 2). In it, you play as a skater who joins a new c‚Ä¶
articles.title: OlliOlli World is reminding us what it‚Äôs like to be outside again

articles.description:
Image: Riot Games
    

  
Meet KAY/O
 Valorant‚Äôs newest Agent is a robot named KAY/O with the power to suppress his enemies‚Äô abilities. The new Agent will be part of Valorant‚Äôs Episode 3 update, which should also include a fairly large patch for the game.
KAY/O is an Initiator, which means he‚Äôll be great at pushing his way onto sites and breaking through enemy defenses. One of KAY/O‚Äôs abilities allows him to throw a special knife that prevents enemies in a small area from using their abilities ‚Äî an effect called suppressed. His Ultimate includes something similar but radiates out from his body. KAY/O‚Äôs Ultimate also gives him a Combat Stim when he uses it, and if he dies during the Ultimate he‚Äôll have the chance to be revived by a teammate. 


While his suppression effects are his most un‚Ä¶
articles.title: Valorant‚Äôs new Agent is a robot who can disable enemy abilities

articles.description:
Image: CD Projekt Red
    

  
Patch 1.23 is another bug squasher
 Developer CD Projekt Red rolled out a new patch for Cyberpunk 2077 on Thursday, patch 1.23, that squashes more bugs and fixes a variety of quest-related issues in the first-person shooter. The patch arrives just days before Cyberpunk 2077 is set to return to Sony‚Äôs PlayStation Store, after a six-month absence.
Console players will therefore be pleased to read that patch 1.23 for Cyberpunk 2077 promises ‚Äúnumerous crash fixes in animations, UI, scene, physics and gameplay systems‚Äù and ‚Äúvarious console CPU optimizations,‚Äù according to CD Projekt Red‚Äôs patch notes. The developer says the update will reduce the number of overall crashes.
Elsewhere, the patch appears to primarily address quest and open-world bugs, a list of which‚Ä¶
articles.title: Cyberpunk 2077‚Äôs latest patch fixes more bugs ahead of PS4 re-release

articles.description:
Image: EA Tiburon/Electronic Arts
    

  
EA Sports also promises substantial additions, demanded by the community, to Madden‚Äôs franchise mode
 It was a preseason game, Clint Oldenburg said. ‚ÄúNot a regular season game, not a playoff game.‚Äù The crowd in Seattle still annihilated his ability to think.
‚ÄúWhen I was at the line of scrimmage, I couldn‚Äôt hear anything. All I could hear was the crowd,‚Äù said Oldenburg, today Madden NFL 22‚Äôs gameplay producer, back then an offensive lineman trying to make the Denver Broncos‚Äô 53-man roster. 
Yes, home-field advantage is real, Oldenburg said. With crowds returning after a pandemic year quieted the NFL‚Äôs stadiums last fall, they‚Äôll be a more noticeable part of the league‚Äôs video game, too. But a home field‚Äôs challenge won‚Äôt simply be in ramped-up volu‚Ä¶
articles.title: Madden NFL 22 upgrades Franchise mode and adds home-field advantage

articles.description:
Image: Greg Lobanov,¬†Alexis Dean-Jones,¬†Madeline Berger,¬†Em Halberstadt, Lena Raine/Finji
    

  
A multiplayer game for friendship
 There are some multiplayer games that come with a warning: Play with your friends and family at your own risk. That includes games like Overcooked and any Mario Party title ‚Äî Overcooked for the stress of working together in chaotic scenarios, and Mario Party for the inevitable strain of betrayal. This doesn‚Äôt mean these games aren‚Äôt great or fun: They‚Äôre fantastic! They can both bring you together or tear you apart. But in the end, the games are infamous ‚Äî for different reasons ‚Äî for the fights they create.
However, I‚Äôve found the antidote: Chicory: A Colorful Tale. Released in June, Chicory is a 2D adventure game named after a famous painter who stops paint‚Ä¶
articles.title: Chicory: A Colorful Tale‚Äôs multiplayer is the anti-Mario Party

articles.description:
Image: Free Lives/Terra Nil
    

  
But can its systems support more complex play?
 Free Lives is best known for its 2014 side-scrolling action game, Broforce. The game features pixelated caricatures of action movie heroes blowing stuff up with big guns and even bigger American flags. So imagine my surprise in early June when the team announced its next project, Terra Nil, a ‚Äúreverse city-builder‚Äù about restoring wild areas after an ecological disaster.
After spending a few hours with an early demo of Terra Nil, it‚Äôs hard to imagine a bigger departure for the studio, but I‚Äôm all in. After nearly two years of homebound hyper-vigilance brought on by political chaos and a global pandemic, this is the deeply chill distraction that I needed.
My demo of Terra Nil started out on a flat plane lac‚Ä¶
articles.title: Terra Nil is the video game version of ‚Äònature is healing‚Äô

articles.description:
Image: Evil Geniuses
    

  
Officially licensed to ‚Äòfuck shit up‚Äô says Evil Geniuses‚Äô MK11 star
 Five-time EVO champion SonicFox now has their own plushie. ‚ÄúThis furry gremlin has been signed off by SonicFox to officially fuck shit up,‚Äù says the merch store for Evil Geniuses, SonicFox‚Äôs club since last spring.
The plushie is 10 by 11 by 4 inches, 100% polyester, and ‚ÄúModeled after the ‚ÄòDefender of Trans Rights‚Äô themselves,‚Äù says the plushie‚Äôs product page. ‚ÄúThe community begged for it; SonicFox listened.‚Äù And that, as they say, is that.
SonicFox (real name Dominique McLean) was named Esports Player of the Year at The Game Awards 2018. In 2019, after coming out as non-binary, their 72-hour Mortal Kombat livestream raised $22,000 for The Trevor Project, a national advocacy organization focusing on LGBTQ persons under age 25. Active since 2013, SonicFox joined Evil Geniuses in March 2020, shortly after winning Mortal Kombat Final Kombat 20.
Most recently SonicFox took first place and a $15,000 prize in WePlay Esports Ultimate Fighting League‚Äôs Mortal Kombat 11 tournament, a Tier 1 event held in March. They prevailed 5-4 and 5-1 in the grand final using The Joker against Sayed ‚ÄúTekken Master‚Äù Hashim Ahmed, playing as Cetrion.
articles.title: Fighting games‚Äô favorite furry SonicFox gets their own plush

articles.description:
Image: Treyarch/Activision
    

  
The update also adds the new Mauer der Toten Zombies map
 Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War is heading into a new season with a patch that‚Äôs full of new content, plus a couple of balance changes for good measure.
The biggest new addition with the patch is probably coming to Zombies mode with the new Mauer der Toten round-based map. Unlike the Outbreak mode with its massive map, Mauer der Toten will be more of a traditional Zombies experience, including a return to Berlin. If Outbreak is more your style, there‚Äôs also a new Zoo area for that mode as well. Finally, both Outbreak and Mauer der Toten will have Easter eggs that kick off on Thursday, June 17. 
Season 4 will also come with plenty of new weapons and maps for Black Ops Cold War. For new weapons pla‚Ä¶
articles.title: Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War season 4 patch balances assault rifles (again)

articles.description:
Image: Sega
    

  
Oh good, I can play Monkey Target again
 The first three Super Monkey Ball games, Super Monkey Ball, Super Monkey Ball 2, and Super Monkey Ball Deluxe, are getting an HD remaster. Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania will launch worldwide on Oct. 5 to commemorate the 20th anniversary of the Super Monkey Ball franchise, as announced by a release from Sega.
Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania will come to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X. It will cost $39.99 for the console version and $29.99 for the PC version. 
The remaster brings back the original three games with updated graphics and additional, modern features like online challenges and leaderboards. It also introduces a comic book-style of storytelling and new playable characters. Key features of the original, like 4-player local co-op will still be present in the remaster. Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania recreates roughly 300 levels and 12 minigames from the first three games.
In the Super Monkey Ball franchise, players navigate a monkey in a hamster ball while playing sports-inspired minigames or perilous and zany obstacle courses. The first two games launched in the early 2000s  exclusively to the GameCube. The franchise has since launched on numerous platforms, consoles to mobile versions, with more than a dozen titles.
Sega also announced a Digital Deluxe version of Super Monkey Ball Banana Mania. It will feature six additional classic character skins, three legendary console skins, 10 customizable items and the classic soundtrack. Fans will also be able to grab a special 20th Anniversary Edition of the game that includes an art book, reversible cover, collectable sleeve and 10 cosmetic items. The Digital Deluxe edition will retail for $49.99.
articles.title: The first three Super Monkey Ball games are getting an HD remaster

articles.description:
The horror game was originally released on the Wii U
 The most recent game in the Fatal Frame series is getting a modern update with Fatal Frame: Maiden of Black Water for Nintendo Switch and other modern consoles. The new version of the game was revealed during Nintendo‚Äôs E3 2021 Nintendo Direct presentation. 
The game takes place on the fictional Hikami Mountain where players control several different characters as they attempt to survive the notoriously supernatural mountain and the variety of hostile spirits and ghosts that occupy it. Each of the game‚Äôs protagonists lends a different prospective to the game‚Äôs overall story of Ose Kurosawa, a mysterious shrine maiden who was chosen to be part of a powerful and dark ritual. 
Maiden of Black Water is the fifth mainline game in the Fatal Frame series and was originally released in 2014 on Wii U. Just like all of the games in the series, this one focuses on a series of supernatural experiences and spirits that can only be warded off by using a special camera, called the Camera Obscura. The new version of the game will also come with new costumes and photo modes that weren‚Äôt in the original, as well as updated visuals.
Fatal Frame: Maiden of Black Water is coming to Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X sometime later this year.
articles.title: Fatal Frame: Maiden of Black Water is getting a remaster for modern consoles

articles.description:
Image: Shedworks/Raw Fury
    

  
You have one week to try them all
 Xbox‚Äôs whirlwind week at E3 2021 isn‚Äôt just limited to big new IPs and AAA launches on Xbox Game Pass. Starting today, Xbox One and Xbox Series X owners can also get their hands on demo versions of 40 yet-to-be-released indie games as part of the ID@Xbox Summer Game Demo Fest.
If you want to try them out, you shouldn‚Äôt wait. The showcase only runs for one week, from June 15-21. 
The list of demos is filled with upcoming indie titles like the adorable animal-filled adventure game Button City and the Tribeca Film Festival award-nominated Sable. Oh, and also you can go play Lawn Mowing Simulator, if that scratches your virtual homeowner‚Äôs itch. 
Here are the 12 newly announced games coming to Xbox you can play:
Arietta of S‚Ä¶
articles.title: Xbox players just got 40 free demos of new indie games coming soon

articles.description:
Image: Turtle Beach
    

  
This is the yoke and throttle that you‚Äôve been looking for
 We‚Äôve known that Microsoft Flight Simulator was coming to Xbox consoles for literally years now. This week at E3 Microsoft finally gave us a launch date ‚Äî July 27. What remained unclear to fans, however, was how they were actually going to fly those airplanes on a console. Sure, you could use an Xbox controller, but the grass is especially green on the PC side of the fence with a boatload of boutique controllers and high-end joysticks. 
Fear not, console pilots, for Turtle Beach has come to your rescue with the VelocityOne Flight Universal Control System. It‚Äôs a full-fledged yoke and throttle compatible with Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S, Xbox One, and Windows 10. The announcement was made Monday in a n‚Ä¶
articles.title: Fear not, Flight Simulator fans: Turtle Beach is making a new controller for Xbox Series X

articles.description:
Image: Capcom
    

  
Capcom says DLC is now in development
 The story of Resident Evil Village will continue in a new expansion, Capcom announced Tuesday during its E3 2021 showcase. By popular demand, Capcom said, ‚Äúdevelopment has just started‚Äù on additional DLC for the game. 
Unfortunately, Capcom did not provide details about its plans, but promised more info at a later date.
Resident Evil Village producer Tsuyoshi Kanda said that players will have something to look forward to next month, however. Kanda announced that Resident Evil RE: Verse, the deathmatch multiplayer mode that features heroes and bioweapons from the Resident Evil franchise, will go live in July after a brief delay.
The previous game in the franchise, Resident Evil 7 biohazard, received a number of post-release story-based add-ons, including Banned Footage Vol. 1 and 2, Not A Hero starring Chris Redfield, and End of Zoe.
Resident Evil Village was released in May for Google Stadia, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Windows PC, Xbox One, and Xbox Series X. In our review of the first-person survival-horror game, we called Village‚Äôs blend of gunplay and scares ‚Äúthe perfect cocktail of horror and action.‚Äù
articles.title: Resident Evil Village is getting an expansion

articles.description:
Image: Reddit
    

  
Still green, though
 Microsoft is, apparently, changing the game cases for Xbox titles. Box art seen at Best Buy and other retailers more prominently calls out the compatible platforms while eschewing the embossed Xbox logo that fronted game cases since the launch of Xbox One.
It‚Äôs a subtle change and, considering how many full copy sales of video games take place online today, one that some may not notice for a while. It also seems necessary considering Microsoft is supporting two consoles and, the Xbox Series X‚Äôs backward compatibility notwithstanding, some games are in fact Series X only.
Microsoft has long aspired to unify its video games presence under a single brand, but it still can‚Äôt quite seal the deal. Xbox games are sold on The Microsoft Store, for example, while PC subscribers peruse the Xbox Game Pass for PC library. And let us never speak of Games for Widows Live, which Microsoft needed two years to finally shut down.
Bottom line to you, the consumer: Not much, really. The design change probably means Microsoft saves a few cents stamping the Xbox logo on the top. We now return you to your regularly scheduled E3.
articles.title: Don‚Äôt adjust your Xbox: Microsoft changes game cases again

articles.description:
Image: Rare/Xbox Game Studios
    

  
Development now under new leadership
 Xbox fans wondering why Rare‚Äôs Everwild didn‚Äôt show up at Sunday‚Äôs E3 showcase now have an answer: The studio has ‚Äúcompletely rebooted‚Äù the open-world adventure game under a new creative director, and its release is multiple years away, reports Video Games Chronicle.
Citing sources with knowledge of Everwild‚Äôs development, VGC reports that Rare has undertaken ‚Äúa complete overhaul of the game‚Äôs design and direction‚Äù following the departure last fall of its previous creative director, Simon Woodroffe. Gregg Mayles ‚Äî who has worked at Rare for more than three decades, and is the studio‚Äôs most senior employee on the creative side, according to VGC ‚Äî has been tapped as creative director for the ongoing reboot, VGC repo‚Ä¶
articles.title: Report: Everwild ‚Äòrestarted from scratch,‚Äô Rare now aiming for 2024

The update will also include new zombies content and new maps
 Call of Duty: Black Ops Cold War and Warzone are getting a new season in just a few days and Treyarch has finally given fans a preview of what they can expect. The new addition to Verdansk will be a new location centered around a crashed satellite ‚Äî the focus of the season‚Äôs reveal trailer, which debuted during Summer Games Fest last week. It seems that the crash will take out some existing structures, but is also big enough for players to fight in and around. Meanwhile, Verdansk‚Äôs season 3 Reloaded addition of the Nak‚Ä¶
